amendment.description: To improve the authorizations of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2500 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2500 proposed by Senator Sullivan for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S4647; text: CR S4647) To improve the authorizations of appropriations.
